featured.text: Finally, on 25 June 1977, a seventh and final bolt struck Sullivan as he was fishing in a pond.
“If he was, the first bolt 25 enough.

definition.zh_def: 螺栓；用於連接物體的金屬釘或螺絲，通常有螺紋。
definition.en_def: A metal pin or fastener used to hold objects together, typically with a threaded shaft.
definition.example: He used a bolt to secure the two pieces of wood together.
